attributes.action: Advise Cadbury’s to Bring Back the Spira Chocolate Bar
attributes.additional_details: To help us grab the attention of Cadbury and the Media and assist us to have the tables turned, in our bid to Bring Back the ‘Spira’ Chocolate Bar
attributes.background: Debate and Agree that the ‘Greatest Chocolate Bar’ ever to be made, was the Cadbury Spira and then officially advise Cadbury, to bring it back! This should be top of the agenda and it is what we the people want and need!

rejection.details:
Petitions must call for a specific action that the UK Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about what products to sell are a matter for individual businesses, not the Government or Parliament.

As a result it is not possible for the Government or Parliament to take the action you have requested.
